author: Brendon Chambers
content:
Does anyone else get a hangover when they break ketosis?
I had fried chicken with some friends on Friday and I honestly feel like I went out and drank a bottle of jack.
Feel like absolute dogshit since Friday

replies.reply_by: And it feels like you've â€¦ See more
Yes we.yad.nachos Friday night Saturday felt like shit n today lol
Seed oils etc.

Yep, when I used to do keto I would always suffer if I ate bad foods. Haven't eaten badly this round with carnivore, but last weekend I drank wine and cocktails and I swear my hangover lasted two days ðŸ™„

Just think that that is probably the way you used to feel when eating that type of food, however you have slowly transitioned to feeling the way you now "normally" do since you changed your lifestyle.
replies.content: When you eat the crap again, you have gone back to feeling crap

replies.reply_by: I was fasting for 3 days and made the mistake of breaking it it with a Chinese buffet. I only had meat options, no rice or noodles at all.
replies.content:
Worst "off the wagon" reaction I've ever had. For reference, I cycle 20km to work and my heart rate doesn't go that high.
May be an image of digital watch and text

replies.reply_by: Absolutely, I would almost go so far as to say I get derealisation. Never worth it.
